data.actual_result: You dont hear the guy who is talking with the desktop app.

data.short_description: I cant hear when other people talk when Im using Mozilla Firefox
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Mozilla Firefox - Login in  - Join any Discord Voice Channel - Tell your friend/connect with other account and talk with this other account (using the desktop app)
